name: Laboratory for Genome Bioinformatics
short_description: Code repository for the Laboratory for Genome Bioinformatics at Texas A&M.  The LGB project was initiated primarily to support biologists at Texas A&M needing help with bioinformatics in order to use new genomic technologies.
